translation.en: [whispers] Watch it.
[Roland groans] Amateurs.
Now you know I hate to question your decisions, Miriam, but--
translation.zh:
‎你了解我的 我不想
‎质疑你的决定 米莉亚 但是…

translation.en: Do I look like the kind of fool dumb enough to storm a mage tower?
translation.zh:
‎我看起来像是一个会
‎蠢到去硬闯法师塔的人吗？

translation.en: They were Dolph's idea.
You mean he wants those idiots and the two of us
translation.zh: ‎你是说他让那几个白痴和我们两个

translation.en: to fight our way through that entire building,
steal a case of lyrium and fight our way back out again?
translation.zh: ‎偷几箱利瑞姆 然后再一路打出来？

translation.en: What's your plan? [grunts]
[Miriam] Bribed the washer woman.
All we really needed were a couple of mage robes
translation.zh: ‎事实上 我们只需要几件法师长袍

translation.en: and, uh, you know,
a distraction.
Dolph will be livid.
Yeah. Probably.
[Dolph] Stupid, blasted knife-ear!
Just couldn't stick to the plan, could ya, elf?
translation.zh: ‎你就是不能按计划行事 是吧 ？精灵

translation.en: Always so sure you know better.
I got the lyrium, Dolph.
translation.zh: ‎我把利瑞姆给你拿回来了 多尔夫

translation.en: Yeah, and got three recruits jailed,
translation.zh: ‎是啊 还把三个新人搞去坐牢了

translation.en: including my nephew.
If they couldn't get past two guards, they never could have taken a mage tower.
translation.zh:
‎如果连两个守卫都通不过
‎他们是进不去法师塔的

translation.en: Hey, it's me you're angry with, not Roland.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 惹你生气的是我 不是罗兰

translation.en: Yeah, damn right, I am!
You know, half my men seem to think you are the one in charge here.
translation.zh: ‎我手下一半的人似乎认为你是老大

translation.en: And he's the worst.
You're still the boss.
I hope we are not interrupting anything.
Sapphira?
Hey, Miri. You kept the scarf.
translation.zh: ‎嗨 米莉 你还留着这条围巾

translation.en: No. No! You don't just get to… [scoffs]
-[Hira] I know. -Not after you just left.
translation.zh:
‎-我知道
‎-特别是你一走了之以后

translation.en: -I'm sorry, but-- -I don't care about your apologies.
Please, not here.
Who are you?
Ah, sorry about that. They, uh, have history.
translation.zh: ‎不好意思 她们有点过往

translation.en: We are the ones that commissioned this little robbery.
translation.zh: ‎我们是本场小劫案的委托人

translation.en: Oh, Master Fairbanks. So nice to finally meet you in person.
translation.zh: ‎费尔班克斯大师 很高兴终于见到您

translation.en: -Uh, sorry about-- -No apologies necessary.
The lyrium was only to see if you were as good as Hira promised.
translation.zh:
‎让你偷利瑞姆 只是为了确认
‎你是不是像希拉说的那么厉害

translation.en: And you are. Uh, both of you.
Which is why I'd like to offer you both a job.
translation.zh: ‎所以我想给你们俩一份工作

translation.en: Hey! Customer or not,
nobody does anything in Dolph's Daggers without Dolph's say-so.
I suggest you take it.
You see, I already told the City Guard where to find the missing lyrium.
translation.zh:
‎我已经告诉城市守卫队
‎上哪儿去找失踪的利瑞姆了

translation.en: The entire garrison is on its way right now.
You did what?
Kill him! Kill them all!
[pants] Both of you, stay down.
This isn't about you, Miriam.
-Stand aside. -[straining] No.
[pants] The Guard is coming, Hasem.
translation.zh: ‎守卫们很快就到了 哈森

translation.en: Your children need their father,
and I will kill every one of you before I let you touch her. I swear it.
translation.zh:
‎在你们碰到她之前
‎我发誓会把你们统统杀光

translation.en: -Do you understand me? -[straining]
-[Miriam] Do you understand? -[straining]
Daggers, move out.
No, no, no! She is not the boss! I am!
Finish them off!
Next time, aim a little more to the right.
translation.zh: ‎下次我会再往右瞄准一点的

translation.en: Seems like a good time for a new venture.
translation.zh: ‎看来是时候发展下新事业了

translation.en: -[bell tolling] -Miriam! Wait.
You were magnificent, you know that?
Not enough to stop you from leaving me to join the Inquisition.
translation.zh:
‎显然还没了不起到
‎能阻止你离开我去加入审判庭

translation.en: I asked you to come.
But there was a demon-spewing hole in the sky.
translation.zh: ‎天上的裂口正在不断涌出恶魔

translation.en: Somebody had to stop it from destroying the world.
But you didn't!
The Herald of Andraste sealed the breach. They killed Corypheus.
translation.zh:
‎安德拉斯特先驱号封住了裂口
‎是他们杀了克里菲厄斯

translation.en: People like us don't change the world, Hira.
translation.zh:
‎我们这样的人
‎是无法改变世界的 希拉

translation.en: Because people like you never try!
translation.zh: ‎因为像你这样的人从没尝试过去改变

translation.en: Listen, I know I'm asking a lot,
translation.zh: ‎听着 我知道我的要求很过分

translation.en: but the Inquisition gave me one last mission before it broke up
translation.zh:
‎但审判庭在解散前
‎给了我最后一个任务

translation.en: and I need your help to do it.
And after this, we can go to the Hinterlands
translation.zh:
‎等这些事情过去之后
‎我们可以去赫特兰德

translation.en: and make cheese for all I care, so long as we're together.
translation.zh:
‎就是让我做奶酪也行
‎只要我们在一起

translation.en: What's the job?
Let's meet the rest of the team first.
translation.zh: ‎我们先去见见队里其他人吧

translation.en: Roland, Miriam, this is Qwydion,
translation.zh:
‎罗兰 米莉亚 ‎这是奎迪恩 一位叛逆的法师
‎也是一名天才的疗愈者

translation.en: a rebel mage and a talented healer.
translation.zh:
‎这是奎迪恩 一位叛逆的法师
‎也是一名天才的疗愈者

translation.en: And that's Lacklon.
Lord of Fortune and a talented… whatever the opposite of healer is.
translation.zh:
‎我是财富之神和天才…
‎疗愈者的反义词

translation.en: I'm not like a real rebel, you know.
translation.zh: ‎我也不能说是叛逆 你知道

translation.en: My passion is more elemental magic, like explosions. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎我更喜欢原始的魔法 比方说爆炸

translation.en: But people pay you more to blow stuff up if it's for something they believe in, so…
translation.zh:
‎人们为了自己的信念
‎会愿意花大价钱炸毁东西 所以…

translation.en: Nice to meet you.
Eh, we'll see, right?
Three experienced fighters, two mages, and yourself?
translation.zh:
‎三位经验丰富的战士
‎两位法师 还有你自己？

translation.en: This job must be dangerous.
It is.
Before the Inquisition ended,
we learned the Tevinter Chantry was in possession of an artifact.
translation.zh: ‎我们得知德凡特教会拥有一件人法宝

translation.en: The Circulum Infinitus.
What's a Circu, whatever it is, do?
No idea. I'm not a mage, but in the words of Cassandra Pentaghast…
translation.zh:
‎不知道 我又不是法师
‎但是按照卡桑德拉的说法…

translation.en: It does not matter.
All you need to know is that it is an extremely dangerous artifact
translation.zh:
‎你只需要知道
‎这是一件非常危险的物品

translation.en: fueled by blood magic.
And I, for one, cannot recall any good
translation.zh: ‎就我个人而言 只要是由杀戮驱动的

translation.en: coming from something powered by murder.
The Inquisition told Hira and I to steal the Circulum
translation.zh: ‎审判庭要希拉和我去把无限宝环偷来

translation.en: and deliver it to Orlais.
We tracked it to an old summer palace belonging to the Tevinter Divine,
translation.zh:
‎我们的线索指向了一座属于
‎德凡特教皇的废弃夏宫

translation.en: the head of their faith.
It's being studied by a Magister named Rezaren--
Ammosine.
[Fairbanks] Know this guy?
And the palace is in the city of Nessum.
translation.zh: ‎而宫殿所在的地方叫做奈苏姆城

translation.en: [chuckles dryly] That's why you needed me.
Yes, but only because there was no other option.
translation.zh: ‎是的 但我们也是走投无路才找到你

translation.en: We have a very small window of time.
You're the only person outside Tevinter that's ever been in that building.
translation.zh:
‎你是德凡特以外
‎唯一进入过这座宫殿的人

translation.en: You know its layout, its defenses.
translation.zh: ‎你知道它的地形和防御布置

translation.en: You're our only hope of pulling this off, Miriam.
translation.zh: ‎你是我们成功的唯一希望 米莉亚

translation.en: Will you help us,
please?
No.
[Hira] Miriam, wait.
[Miriam] I told you I never go back there and… [chuckles sadly] …yet here you come,
translation.zh:
‎我告诉过你 我不可能再回去的
‎但你还是来找了我

translation.en: spinning a fairy tale about our happy cheese-making future
translation.zh:
‎还编出一个我们俩
‎做着奶酪的幸福未来

translation.en: just so you can use me.
You're right. I should have told you everything, and for that, I'm sorry.
translation.zh:
‎你说得对
‎我早该把一切都告诉你 我很抱歉

translation.en: But I think you might need this mission as much as I do.
translation.zh: ‎但我觉得你和我一样需要这个任务

translation.en: You have to stop running from the past, Miri.
translation.zh: ‎你不能再逃避过去了 米莉亚

translation.en: If you can't do it now, I worry that maybe you never will.
translation.zh:
‎如果你现在做不到
‎我担心你可能永远都做不到

translation.en: And I can't live like that.
[sighs] I won't set foot in that place.
And I'd never ask you to. Just show us a way in.
translation.zh: ‎我绝不会要求你这么做 ‎只要告诉我们怎么进去就可以

translation.en: Let me help you take something back from those bastards
translation.zh: ‎让我帮你从那些混蛋手里夺回些东西

translation.en: and we can live happily ever after.
translation.zh: ‎我们从此就能过上幸福的生活

translation.en: Together?
Together.
[Fairbanks] It's easy to think Tevinter is the same as any other country.
translation.zh: ‎人们以为德凡特和其他国家并无二异

translation.en: But it's not.
Magic rules there, and those who have it rule everyone else.
translation.zh:
‎魔法统治着国家
‎而拥有魔力的人统治着其他人

translation.en: The Templars don't protect people from mages who turn evil.
translation.zh:
‎圣殿骑士不会保护人们
‎免受变节法师的伤害

translation.en: Instead, they act as enforcers for powerful mages called Magisters.
translation.zh:
‎而是成为魔导团员
‎也就是位高权重法师的执法者

translation.en: They have their own religion, the Imperial Chantry,
translation.zh: ‎他们有自己的信仰 也就是帝国教会

translation.en: and their own magic-wielding Divine to lead it.
translation.zh: ‎由他们自己会魔法的教皇统领

translation.en: Qunari are hated, and most elves live in outright slavery.
translation.zh:
‎库纳利受人厌憎
‎大多数的精灵则完全沦为了奴隶

translation.en: Blood magic, raised corpses, and demons may be frowned on officially,
translation.zh:
‎表面上 官方并不赞成
‎血魔法、借尸还魂和召唤恶魔

translation.en: but Magisters are the officials,
translation.zh: ‎但魔导团员才是真正的领导层

translation.en: so they tend to turn a blind eye towards anyone with power.
translation.zh:
‎他们对任何有权利的人
‎都睁一只眼闭一只眼

translation.en: Since we're robbing The Divine himself, well, let's stay on our toes, huh?
translation.zh:
‎既然我们要抢劫教皇
‎我们最好还是谨慎为妙

translation.en: I shit you not.
It was just a hairy nug the whole time.
translation.zh: ‎原来一直就是只毛茸茸的兔猪而已

translation.en: I can get up by my damn self.
You wanna help? Tell the world's tallest elf to slow down.
translation.zh:
‎真想帮忙吗？
‎叫世界上最高的精灵慢点走

translation.en: Hey, man, you can't blame someone for not wanting to spend a lot of time in a country that enslaved her.
translation.zh:
‎你不能怪她 在一个让她
‎为奴的国家里 她一刻不想多待

translation.en: What? Isn't she a runaway?
[chuckles] Don't be dense. Fairbanks would never be stupid enough to hire a runaway. Right?
translation.zh:
‎别傻了 费尔班克斯
‎永远不会蠢到雇个逃亡者 对吧？

translation.en: She's an elf from Tevinter.
I've left it at that. I suggest you do the same.
translation.zh:
‎这是我对她的称号
‎我建议你也这么做

translation.en: You can't be serious.
What if Little Miss Wayfinder's still being hunted?
translation.zh:
‎如果这位给我们带路的
‎导游小姐依然在被追杀呢？

translation.en: What if she loses her nerve as soon as she sees home?
translation.zh: ‎万一她见到老家就失去理智了呢？

translation.en: Watch your tongue, dwarf.
Whatever I am, I've survived things
translation.zh: ‎不管我是什么 我经历过的事

translation.en: that make the deep roads look like a pleasant stroll.
translation.zh: ‎让荆棘丛生的路对我来说如履平地

translation.en: And I assure you, you'll lose your nerve long before I will.
translation.zh: ‎我保证 先吓破胆的人一定是你

translation.en: So lengthen your stride and shut the fuck up!
translation.zh: ‎把你的嘴闭上 迈开步子走！

translation.en: That hurt me a little.
-[Qwydion giggles] -[scoffs] Blasted elfin hearing.
translation.zh: ‎妈的 精灵的耳朵不是白长的

translation.en: What are you smiling at, horn-head?
If you don't take him, I will.
translation.zh: ‎你不收拾他的话 就让我来

translation.en: Wow, it's beautiful.
So is a mage's staff right before it shoots fire at you.
translation.zh:
‎法师手下朝你动手之前
‎你也会这么觉得

translation.en: [guard] Hold. State your business.
-Ah, my wife and I are from Carastes. -[coughs]
translation.zh: ‎我和我妻子来自克拉斯特斯

translation.en: She has bellows cough,
translation.zh: ‎她经常咳嗽 而且伴有喘鸣音

translation.en: and we're following the Pilgrimage of Divine Adnias with our servants
translation.zh:
‎我们带着仆人 沿着神使
‎阿德尼亚斯的朝圣之路来到这里

translation.en: in hopes that she might be healed.
Any elf must post a five-gold bond in case they break the peace.
translation.zh:
‎任何精灵都必须上交五块
‎金币作为保证金 以防他们作乱

translation.en: -Wha-- Five gold? -[blow thuds]
Light of the Maker shine upon you.
And you as well.
Uh, a month's wages to get through the gate? They might as well just rob us outright.
translation.zh:
‎进门就要花上一个月的工资？
‎他们怎么不直接抢劫呢

translation.en: We won't be here for long, okay?
translation.zh: ‎我们不会在这里待很久的 好吗？

translation.en: [stammers] Uh, I know. It's just…
[sighs heavily] …every breath I take here is one too many.
translation.zh: ‎每一次呼吸都让我喘不过气来

translation.en: [Fairbanks] Well then,
we should get to work.
[Miriam] They may call it a summer palace,
but it's actually three different structures joined together.
translation.zh: ‎但其实由三座独立建筑物连接而成

translation.en: The cathedral is at the top. No way in there except from the palace itself.
translation.zh: ‎最上方是教堂 只能从皇宫本身进入

translation.en: Below that, the whole place is a maze of secret passages,
translation.zh:
‎下面的整个地方
‎就是一个布满秘密通道的迷宫

translation.en: easy to get lost in.
And it's all built atop a sealed temple to the old gods.
translation.zh:
‎这一切都建造在一个
‎供奉旧神的封印神庙之上

translation.en: It'll take time to find a way in.
translation.zh: ‎要花点时间才能找到进去的路

translation.en: [Fairbanks] Don't worry. I've got a place.
[Miriam] I'll need all the time you can give.
The furniture is all High Imperium, of course,
translation.zh: ‎当然 家具都是帝国贵族风格

translation.en: and the estate features a generous private courtyard
translation.zh: ‎这所房子还自带一处宽阔的庭院

translation.en: that I'm sure your bride will love.
[Miriam] If the smuggler routes are closed, there are discreet ways into the palace itself.
translation.zh:
‎如果走私路线被关闭了
‎还有其它不显眼的小路可以走

translation.en: [Fairbanks] You mean one of the Divines was involved in something illicit?
translation.zh:
‎你是说其中一个
‎神使参与了不法之事？

translation.en: I am shocked.
[Miriam] Even if this Divine isn't, they could still be usable.
translation.zh:
‎就算这个神使没做违法勾当
‎那些线路也可能用得上

translation.en: I don't like the sound of "could."
Well, neither do I, but I'm not the only one with a job to do, am I?
translation.zh:
‎我也不喜欢
‎但成败不在于我一个人 不是吗？

translation.en: You're right. We'll strike during the evening service.
translation.zh:
‎没错 我们准备在晚上宗教
‎活动的时候发起进攻 奎迪恩和我…

translation.en: -Qwydion and I-- -The magic mavens.
Will ensure everyone in the cathedral stays put during the robbery.
translation.zh:
‎会确保在抢劫期间
‎教堂里的所有人都留在原地

translation.en: [chuckles] I mean, naturally, but that's gonna take a lot of magic.
translation.zh: ‎当然了 但这会需要很多魔法

translation.en: So, uh, we should stock up to be safe, right?
translation.zh: ‎安全起见 我们应该蓄点魔法 对吧？

translation.en: I mean, we don't want to run out in the middle of things.
translation.zh: ‎我们可不想行动到一半 魔法用光了

translation.en: Don't you think a Qunari buying a small arsenal of magic weapons
translation.zh:
‎你不觉得一个库纳利
‎囤一大批魔法武器

translation.en: might attract some attention?
Oh, it's not about attracting attention.
-[power hums] -It's about what kind. [chuckles]
Yes, can I help you?
translation.zh: ‎你好 有什么能帮助你吗？

translation.en: Oh, I certainly hope so.
My master is new in town and he sent me to fetch
translation.zh: ‎我的师父初来乍到 他让我来帮他拿

translation.en: lyrium, healing potions, knockout powder, arcane grenades of all kinds,
translation.zh:
‎利瑞姆 解药
‎安眠药粉 各种秘制手榴弹

translation.en: and, um, everything else on this list.
What in the name of Andraste does he need all this for?
translation.zh:
‎以安卓斯特之名
‎他需要这些东西做什么？

translation.en: [whispering] Two words. The Blight.
Master barely survived the last one,
and his bad knee says another one's on the way. Oh, yeah.
translation.zh:
‎他的膝盖病又预示
‎下一场荒疫也快来了

translation.en: And if you think I'd let a bunch of mindless, murderous monsters
translation.zh: ‎如果你认为我会让一群无脑的杀人魔

translation.en: touch a hair on that sweet bald head of his, you've got another thing coming.
translation.zh:
‎碰一根他可爱秃头上的头发
‎你就大错特错了

translation.en: You know, I have some more exotic defense items in the back.
translation.zh:
‎你知道吗
‎我有些外国来的武器在后面的房间

translation.en: Show me.
[Roland] Where exactly do Lacklon and I fit in?
translation.zh: ‎拉克伦和我的任务到底是什么？

translation.en: -[both grunting] -[Lacklon] Ain't it obvious? We're the muscle.
translation.zh: ‎这还看不出来吗？ 我们是打架的

translation.en: [Fairbanks] You take out the guards and watch my back in the vault.
translation.zh:
‎你把警卫放倒
‎在我进保险库时为我打掩护

translation.en: Not to mention, make sure everyone else gets out alive.
translation.zh: ‎当然了 还要确保所有人都活着出来

translation.en: I need you both in perfect sync. Think you can handle that?
translation.zh:
‎我需要你们两个行动一致
‎你觉得你能做到吗？

translation.en: If you're trying to distract me, it won't work.
Besides, your girlfriend's still got to find a way into the palace. [Roland] Hmm?
translation.zh:
‎再说了 你的女朋友
‎得先找到一条入宫的路才行

translation.en: I don't have a girlfriend.
[Lacklon] Let's remember, it all means precisely squat if we can't find a way in.
translation.zh:
‎记好了 如果我们找不到
‎进去的办法 一切都是徒劳

translation.en: I'll find it.
I will.
[clears throat] You're in my seat, elf.
There a reason for that?
I'm sorry, is this more important than listening to me?
translation.zh: ‎对不起 这个比听我说话更重要吗？

translation.en: [hesitantly] Of course not, sir.
Apologies.
We have a problem, friend?
Yes, I think this elf's a runaway slave, with stolen property no less.
translation.zh:
‎是的 我觉得这个精灵是个
‎逃跑的奴隶 肯定还带着偷来的东西

translation.en: That's not true, sir. Please, don't turn me in to the guard.
translation.zh:
‎不是这样的 先生
‎拜托别把我交给守卫

translation.en: Sorry, elf, you're coming with me.
translation.zh: ‎不好意思了 精灵 你跟我走

translation.en: Keep walking.
They can't look at the plans.
Fair play on that one.
If you share her, I can pay you for it.
translation.zh: ‎如果你要和我共享她 我可以付你钱

translation.en: -I don't like your implication, friend. -[men laughing]
translation.zh: ‎我不喜欢你的潜台词 朋友

translation.en: Ugh, don't tell me you care about some bat-faced bitch's honor!
translation.zh:
‎别说你在意这种
‎长着蝙蝠脸婊子的尊严！

translation.en: Guess I do.
Let's go! Come on!
Hey, Lacklon! Catch!
What happened here?
Half-off shots.
[laughs] And boom, down they went!
[sighs] You know, my wife's right. I just can't stay out of trouble.
translation.zh: ‎我妻子说得对 我总要惹麻烦

translation.en: [slamming table] Can you just stop?
You think you're all heroes, punching a couple of drunk Tevinters?
translation.zh:
‎你以为自己打倒几个
‎喝醉的德凡特人就成了英雄吗？

translation.en: You think that did anything except risk our mission?
translation.zh:
‎这么做除了拿我们的行动冒风险
‎还有什么用？

translation.en: Neither did I.
[Miriam sighs] Come in.
Do you want to talk about it?
Because the bar fight might not have been the smartest idea, but--
translation.zh:
‎因为酒吧里那场架
‎可能不是最明智的 但是…

translation.en: I figured out a way into the palace.
That's… That's great.
Fairbanks, get in here!
What's wrong?
Everyone okay?
Miriam found a way for us to get into the palace.
translation.zh: ‎米莉亚找到了让大家入宫的方法

translation.en: [Miriam] The only way in.
It's me. There's an old escape tunnel intended for The Divine himself.
translation.zh:
‎也就是我 那里有一条
‎旧时为教皇准备的逃生隧道

translation.en: I cleared the outer entrance,
but the inner one can only be opened from the inside.
translation.zh: ‎但内部的入口只能从里面打开

translation.en: No. You do not have to do this.
[chuckles dryly] Oh, trust me, I don't want to, but…
you all stood up for me.
In the stupidest way possible, but you did it,
translation.zh:
‎虽然方法愚蠢至极
‎但你们依然帮了我

translation.en: and that means something.
Besides…
I really want that cheese farm.
If you don't come back,
I'll kill you myself.
Up-up-up. Don't use them all at once.
That's more your problem than mine, ain't it?
translation.zh:
‎那是你的问题
‎而不是我的问题 不是吗？

translation.en: Thank you.
Just be there.
Where do you think you're going? -This has to be finished before-- -[dramatic sting]
translation.zh: ‎你要去哪里？这里必须先弄完才...

translation.en: Forgive me. On your way.
Come back later.
Hey, I said-- [yelps]
We're in.
